榥榥榥

榥字的基本解释

榥
huàng
窗格：“挥泗凋柏，对榥巢鹰。”
帷幔屏风一类的东西：“渐出阑榥外，万里秋景焯。”
读书床。

榥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàng］
［《廣韻》胡廣切，上蕩，匣。］
(1)窗棂。
(2)量词。

榥字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榥； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页543第35
【唐韻】胡廣切【集韻】【正韻】戸廣切，?音晃。或作櫎。【玉篇】讀書牀也。　又以帛明牕也。【張協·七命】交綺對榥。【晉書·孝友傳贊】揮泗凋柏，對榥巢鷹。

榥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榥字的起名意思

指窗格或是帷幕，屏风。

screen
Basic explanation of words
screen
huàng
Pane: "Whis the Si withered cypress, to the last nest eagle."
Something such as curtains and screens: "Gradually out of the valley, thousands of miles of autumn scenery are sculpted."
Reading bed.
screen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huàng］
["Guangyun" Hu Guangqie, Shangdang, Xie. ]
(1) Window lattice.
(2) Quantifiers.
screen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榥; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 543 35
[Tang Yun] Hu Guangqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] To Guangqie,? Yin Huang. Or make 櫎. [Jade articles] Reading bed too.　I used the silk and the Ming 牕 again. [Zhang Xie·Seven Lives] Cross Qi to Last. [Book of Jin · Commendation of Xiaoyou Friends] Wave Si withered cypress to face the eagle in the nest.

Old glyph
screen
Name meaning
Refers to panes or curtains, screens.
huǎng
сущ.
1) экран, ширма; окно, завешенное шторой
对榥 стоять против окна
2) широкое кресло (для занятий)
